short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto-check if passwords have been pwned

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pin this extension to your browser and it will help you know when you have entered a password that has been leaked. If they icon is a red open padlock then you should consider changing the password used on that site.
